trans-unit.source: Presents the packet information from a call to <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> or <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> 또는 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" />을 호출하여 받은 패킷 정보를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the origin information of the packet that was received as a result of calling the <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> method or <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> 메서드나 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> 메서드를 호출한 결과로 받은 패킷의 원본 정보를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> that indicates the origin information of the packet that was received as a result of calling the <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> method or <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> 메서드나 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> 메서드를 호출한 결과로 받은 패킷의 원본 정보를 나타내는 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: For packets that were sent from a unicast address, the <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address" /> property will return the <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> of the sender; for multicast or broadcast packets, the <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address" /> property will return the multicast or broadcast <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" />.
trans-unit.target: 유니캐스트 주소에서 보낸 패킷의 경우 <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address" /> 속성은 송신자의 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" />를 반환하고, 멀티캐스트 또는 브로드캐스트 패킷의 경우 <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address" /> 속성은 멀티캐스트 또는 브로드캐스트 <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" />를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with this instance.
trans-unit.target: 이 인스턴스와 비교할 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this instance is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: @FSHO2@이 인스턴스가 지정한 개체와 같은지를 나타내는 값을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="comparand" /> is an instance of <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> and equals the value of the instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparand" />가 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" />의 인스턴스이고 해당 인스턴스의 값과 같으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 이 인스턴스의 해시 코드를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: An Int32 hash code.
trans-unit.target: Int32 해시 코드입니다.

trans-unit.source: The hash code is constructed from the values of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 해시 코드의 값에서 생성 되는 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A> 및 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the network interface information that is associated with a call to <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> or <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> 또는 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom(System.IAsyncResult,System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags@,System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation@)" /> 호출과 관련된 네트워크 인터페이스 정보를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value, which represents the index of the network interface.
trans-unit.target: 네트워크 인터페이스의 인덱스를 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use this index with <see cref="M:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces" /> to get more information about the relevant interface.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces" />에 이 인덱스를 사용하면 관련 인터페이스에 대해 더 많은 정보를 가져올 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> instance that is to the left of the equality operator.
trans-unit.target: 같음 연산자의 왼쪽에 있는 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> 인스턴스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> instance that is to the right of the equality operator.
trans-unit.target: 같음 연산자의 오른쪽에 있는 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> 인스턴스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two specified <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> instances are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 두 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> 인스턴스가 같은지 여부를 테스트합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="packetInformation1" /> and <paramref name="packetInformation2" /> are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="packetInformation1" />과 <paramref name="packetInformation2" />가 같으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: This operator tests both the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> values for both arguments.
trans-unit.target: 이 연산자는 둘 다 테스트는 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A> 및 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> 두 인수 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Equals(System.Object)>.
trans-unit.target: 이 연산자는 해당 하는 방법은 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Equals(System.Object)>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> instance that is to the left of the inequality operator.
trans-unit.target: 같지 않음 연산자의 왼쪽에 있는 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> 인스턴스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> instance that is to the right of the inequality operator.
trans-unit.target: 같지 않음 연산자의 오른쪽에 있는 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> 인스턴스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two specified <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> instances are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 두 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation" /> 인스턴스가 서로 다른지 여부를 테스트합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="packetInformation1" /> and <paramref name="packetInformation2" /> are unequal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="packetInformation1" />와 <paramref name="packetInformation2" />가 다르면 <see langword="true" />이고,다르지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: This operator tests both the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> values for both arguments.
trans-unit.target: 이 연산자는 둘 다 테스트는 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A> 및 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> 두 인수 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Equals(System.Object)>.
trans-unit.target: 이 연산자는 해당 하는 방법은 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Equals(System.Object)>합니다.
